title: A kAlam adi antE
sahitya:
A kAlam adi antE I kAlam idiyintE


caraNam 1    adivE dAla kAlam idi bhEdAla kAlam 
    caraNam 2    adi gOpAla kAlam idi pApAla kAlam
    caraNam 3    adi kriSTula kAlam idi kaniSTula kAlam
    caraNam 4    adi nImAla kAlam idi sinimAla kAlam
    caraNam 5    E kAlam kala kAlam muraLI gAnamaya kAlam
